name: The Very Thirsty Plant & the Labyrinth of Ghosts
name_original: The Very Thirsty Plant & the Labyrinth of Ghosts
description: This is a game  about retrieving water for a plant. However, there is an unfortunate problem where the water doesn't cause the plant to grow, and instead, it only causes the labyrinth containing the water to grow, not the plant. Each time you water the plant, you must travel farther and farther to retrieve the water until you eventually fall to ghosts which will only get faster the longer the game goes on.
